CustomField.description: Stores the API names of additional fields from the Project object in the Backlog, Billings, Project Reporting, Revenue Forecast, and Total Project Margin (Workspace) datasets in the PS Cloud Core Analytics app.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Stores the API names of additional fields from the Project object in the Backlog, Billings, Project Reporting, Revenue Forecast, and Total Project Margin (Workspace) datasets in the PS Cloud Core Analytics app.
CustomField.label: Additional Project Field API Names
